title: Simple Calculator
description: Create a basic calculator that performs add, subtract, multiply, and divide operations using functions.
requirements: Create separate functions for each operation: add, subtract, multiply, divide.
Take two numbers and an operator as input from the user.
Call the correct function based on the user's selected operation.
hints: Define separate functions for each operation.
Convert input to integers using int().
Use if/else to ask for the operation.
expectedOutputExample:
Enter first number: 4
Enter second number: 2
Enter operation (+, -, *, /): +
Result: 6
